name: Flow ERC20
desc: An ERC20 token that can be minted using any of the deployed Flow expressions. This token can be made conditionally soulbound by using the 'can transfer' expression.

methods.desc: Initialize a Flow ERC20 contract. This is an intialized implementation of a Flow ERC20

expressions.name: Can Transfer
expressions.desc: An expression that determines whether this token can be transferred. Mint and burns must be handled by the flow expressions.
